"There is nothing simple about cloning, it means you
are everything he was, but more.  For if destiny
required him to fulfill your destiny, it would be his
and not yours," said Fortuneteller.

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "Perhaps," he said thoughtfully.  "But Vector Sigma
> created my spark with everything the original had,
> all of his memory up to 2005.  So am a simple clone,
> or something more?"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
>

> all days"
